mapper.select:
select prime.project_id, prime.data_source, prime.organization, prime.organization_name, prime.project_identifier, prime.project_name, prime.description, prime.sampling_design_type_code, prime.qapp_approved_indicator, prime.qapp_approval_agency_name, prime.project_file_url, prime.monitoring_location_weight_url
order by prime.project_id, prime.data_source, prime.organization, prime.project_identifier
mapper.sql:
select prime.data_source, count (distinct prime.project_id) as project_count
group by rollup(prime.data_source)
